name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: Collector'z Edition
storyline: DRAGON BALL FighterZ is born from what makes the DRAGON BALL series so loved and famous: endless spectacular fights with its all-powerful fighters.
summary:
The Collector's Edition of Dragon Ball Fighter Z includes:
3 Art Boards
Collectorz Box
Exclusive Steelbook

7" Goku Statue with exclusive "Manga Dimension" coloring!
The Dragon Ball Fighter Z Collector'z Edition is perfect for all super fans of Goku. The pack includes a game for Xbox One, 3 artboards, Collectorz Box, exclusive Steelbook & 7” Goku Statue with exclusive “Manga Dimension” coloring. You can play the game; create your own fan artwork & more with this all-in-one collectible. Featuring a thrilling storyline with interesting characters, this game will surely keep you entertained and interested. Go ahead & prepare yourself for a fun-filled gaming adventure.
